      String string0 = Base64.encode("");
      assertEquals("", string0);

      String string0 = Base64.decode("");
      assertEquals("", string0);

  public void test2()  throws Throwable  {

      try {

  @Test(timeout = 4000)
  public void test3()  throws Throwable  {
      String string0 = Base64.decode((String) null);
      assertNull(string0);
  }

  @Test(timeout = 4000)
  public void test4()  throws Throwable  {
      String string0 = Base64.decode("ckYiQFxUeiN8c0spdw==");
      assertEquals("rF\"@\\Tz#|sK)w", string0);
  }

  public void test5()  throws Throwable  {
      String string0 = Base64.encode((String) null);
      assertNull(string0);

      String string0 = Base64.encode(":");
      assertEquals("Og==", string0);
